full_text:
Writing Assignment Rules

Lesson
objectives

¢ Describe the ClaimCenter assignment model
¢ Assign entities to groups and users

| What can be assigned?

¢ Inthe base configuration, ClaimCenter assigns:

* Claims Exposure
* Exposures ON

Gg
+ Matters @

+ Subrogations Claim Ne

* Service Requests _ —_—»
* Activities O aA Fal
¢ To:

* Groups

S,
« Users \w

| Queues G

¢ Are places for unassigned activities to “wait” until they are assigned
¢ Every group in the organization can have one or more associated queues

* Queues can be “shared” by creating the queue on a parent group and making it visible to all
child groups

¢ Activities assigned to the group, but not to a specific user, can be placed in the
queue

¢ Group supervisor can assign activities from the queue to subordinates
* Group members can assign activities from the queue to themselves

¢ Only activities can be placed in a queue

| Assignment rule sets

¢ For each assignable entity there are
two rule sets:
* Global<Entity>AssignmentRules
+ Run first
+ Assign entity to group
* May assign entity to a user
¢ DefaultGroup<Entity>AssignmentRules

+ Run if Global rules do not assign entity toa
user

+ Assign entity to user

v [Rule Sets
> ApprovalRouting
> Archive
Vv Assignment

#) DefaultGroupActivityAssignmentRules

#) DefaultGroupClaimAssignmentRules

#) DefaultGroupExposureAssignmentRules

#) DefaultGroupMatterAssignmentRules

#) DefaultGroupServiceRequestAssignmentRules
&) DefaultGroupSubrogationAssignmentRules
#) GlobalActivityAssignmentRules

#) GlobalExposureAssignmentRules

#) GlobalMatterAssignmentRules

&) GlobalServiceRequestAssignmentRules

#) GlobalSubrogationAssignmentRules

| Assignment flow Gi

¢ To be assignable, an entity must implement the
CCAssignable delegate

¢ All assignable objects in the base application implement

CCAssignable

* Grants access to CurrentAssignment

ind a user or group: Felicity Wagner (Auto1 - TeamA)

and assign object directly without invoking Dan Henson (Autoi - TeamA)

| Demonstration G

Assigning Entities in the UI

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

| Assignment methods

¢ Assign entities to groups and users using provided methods
¢ Are provided by CurrentAssignment

« For example,
activity.CurrentAssignment.assignGroup (activity.Claim.AssignedGroup)
attempts to assign an activity to a group.

¢ Return a Boolean value
* True if assignment was successful

¢ False if appropriate group/user could not be assigned by this rule

| actions.exit() method

Ends the execution of the rule set
¢ Should be executed when assignment is successful:
if (assignMethod) {

actions.exit()

ACTION (activity entity.Activity, actions : gw.rules.Action) :
var assignedGroup = activity.Claim.AssignedGroup

if (activity.CurrentAssignment.assign(assignedGroup, assignedGroup.Supervisor)) {
actions.exit ()

}
END

| Commonly-used assignment methods Ga

Method Object Assigns To...

assignGroup(group) Any The named group

assignGroupByRoundRobin(groupType,
i " *

dicectChiidrenOniw eroup* Group matching specified location and group type
assign(group, user) | Any The named user and group
| Any The next user in the named group (in a cyclical fashion)

User matching location
urrentGroup
assignTolssueOwner() Allbut Claim | The owner of the claim or related exposure

assignManually(responsibleUser) | ay | The group supervisor

assignActivityToQueue(queue, currentGroup) Activity The named activity queue

*, attributeCriteria) Any Auser which matches specified attributes

assignUserByRoundRobin()
‘assignUserByLocation(address, includeSubGroups,

| Dynamic assignment

¢ Is an advanced topic
* Offers two methods:
* assignGroupDynamically(dynamicGroupAssignmentStrategy)
* assignUserDynamically(dynamicUserAssignmentStrategy)
* The argument of these methods must implement an interface, respectively
* DynamicGroupAssignmentStrategy

+ DynamicUserAssignmentStrategy

| Demonstration G

Assignment Methods

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question

,— — Inthe base configuration, what kinds of objects may be assigned to a

Pa queue?
¢

SS Seeoesese sees ee ese

Gi

Answer

,— — Inthe base configuration, what kinds of objects may be assigned to a
Ks queue?
¢

The correct answer is only Activities,

SS eeesee seen ee ese

Gi

Question

_— — What must be true of an entity for its objects to be assignable?

¢
7
¢

SS Seeoesese sees ee ese

Answer

_— — What must be true of an entity for its objects to be assignable?

¢
7

a The correct answer is it must implement the CCAssignable delegate.

SS eeesee seen ee ese

nl

Question

_— — What method ends the execution of a rule set?

¢
7
¢

SS Seeoesese sees ee ese

Answer

_— — What method ends the execution of a rule set?

¢
¢
“ The correct answer is the actions.exit() method.

SS eeesee seen ee ese
